casebody.data:
Frederick J. MACK v. UNITED STATES of America. No. 4677. United States Court of Appeals, Tenth Circuit. Feb. 4, 1954. Neil Horan and Fred L. Schwartz, Denver, Colo., for appellant. Charles S. Vigil, U. S. Atty., Denver, Colo., and Joseph F. Nigro, Asst. U. S. Atty., Trinidad, Colo., for appellee.

Before PHILLIPS, Chief Judge, and. RICE, District Judge.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment of district court affirmed without opinion, on authority of Underwood v. United States of America, 10 Cir., 207 F.2d 862, pursuant to stipulation.
